titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Henry Wysor Family Papers, n.d.
titlestmt.subtitle: Wysor, Henry, Family Papers Ms2015-026

titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2015-026

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: This collection has photocopies of four family record pages from the Henry Wysor family Bible. The papers list the births, deaths, and marriages of the Wysor family line from the 1770s-1960s.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Henry Wysor Family Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Henry Wysor Family Papers, Ms2015-026, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Henry Wysor Family Papers were donated to Special Collections in 2005.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Henry Wysor Family Papers was completed in July 2015.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Henry Wysor was a Revolutionary War soldier, who served in the Continental Army's 8th Virginia Regiment, known as Muhlenburg's German Regiment, and later at Yorktown.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Henry Wysor Family Papers consist of photocopies of the Henry Wysor Family Bible. The four photocopies of the family record pages list the births, deaths, and marriages of the Wysor Family from the 1770s to the 1960s. Names on the record include: George W. Wysor, H.C Wysor Emma Wysor, Elizabeth Wysor, Dr. John C. Wysor, Robert. E Wysor, Col. Robert E. Wysor, Mary Walker Blackmore, Captain J.D. Wysor, and Chantland Wysor.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by page number.
